data.name: DeleteIndex
data.value: Delete only the index files (no downloaded files)

data.name: VisitBlog
data.value: Open the site in the web browser

data.name: ToolTipBlogsDescription
data.value: Sets the number of concurrent processing blogs. Setting this to 2 would process two blogs at a time.

data.name: ToolTipConnectionsDescription
data.value: Sets the number of total concurrent connections. The number is shared between all actively downloading blogs.

data.name: ToolTipDetailsStats
data.value: Number of downloaded post types of total post types

data.name: ToolTipDetailsStatsDescription
data.value: Check to download post type or skip during the download

data.name: DefaultSettingsForBlogs
data.value: These settings are applied to each blog upon addition:

data.name: ToolTipDefaultSettingsForBlogs
data.value: Sets the default settings for newly added blogs.

data.name: ToolTipDefaultSettingsForBlogsDescription
data.value: The scan/download uses indivual settings for each blog. To change them, select blog(s) in the main interface and select the Details tab on the right hand side.

data.name: ForceSize
data.value: Download specified size even if it is not offered

data.name: ToolTipForceSize
data.value: Download the specified resolution of images even if the size is not offered.

data.name: ToolTipForceSizeDescription
data.value: If the crawler only finds lower sized images than specified, enabling this option will rename the url to the specified files size. Those files generally exist and sometimes offer a larger resolution or are just renamed smaller resolution files. It's safe to turn this on.

data.name: ToolTipLimitBandwidth
data.value: Throttles the bandwidth of the downloader

data.name: ToolTipLimitBandwidthDescription
data.value: Sets the maximum bandwidth available for the downloader in kbytes/s. 0 disables throttling.

data.name: ToolTipLimitScan
data.value: Includes the scan bandwidth in the throttling

data.name: ToolTipLimitScanDescription
data.value: Since the data used for scanning is usually small, you should leave this off since the throttling algorithm is too slow to adjust and might negatively impact the scan performance.

data.name: ToolTipScan
data.value: Number of connections used for each scan

data.name: ToolTipScanDescription
data.value: Sets the number of connections used for scanning. Since the data is usually small, you should leave this high. Note: This setting has no impact if the Limit Tumblr Api Connections setting is turned on.

data.name: BandwidthRangeError
data.value: The value must be between 0 and 9,000,000,000,000,000.

data.name: TimeSpanTypeError
data.value: The value must have to form hh:mm:ss.

data.name: IntRangeError
data.value: The value must be between 0 and 2,147,483,647.

data.name: IntTypeError
data.value: The value must be of type integer.

data.name: ToolTipLimitConnectionsApi
data.value: Limit connections to the tumblr api.

data.name: ToolTipLimitConnectionsApiDescription
data.value: A too high value will forcefully close connections (429 -- Limit Exceeded) made to the tumblr api. A too small value will decrease the scanning speed. Set a number/time pair. Note: The tumblr api is only used for regular tumblr blog downloads.

data.name: ToolTipForceRescanDescription
data.value: Rescans the whole blog, not just new posts.

data.name: ToolTipCheckDirectoryForFiles
data.value: Checks the directory for already downloaded files.

data.name: ToolTipCheckDirectoryForFilesDescription
data.value: Checks the directory and the database for already downloaded files. Might negatively impact the download speed for large directories.

data.name: ToolTipDownloadUrlListDescription
data.value: Downloads a url list of the binary files instead of the actual files

data.name: ToolTipPortableModeDescription
data.value: Saves the settings in the folder of the executable instead of AppData.

data.name: ToolTipProxyPasswordDescription
data.value: Credentials are saved in clear text in the settings file

data.name: ToolTipDownloadPagesDescription
data.value: Possible notations are: 1 or 1-3 or 1,2,3. Empty means the whole blog.

data.name: ToolTipPageSizeDescription
data.value: Sets the post per page (should be between 1-50, default 50). E.g. 50 means to scan 50 posts per page.

data.name: ToolTipExportBlogs
data.value: Export all blog urls as text file

data.name: ToolTipExportBlogsDescription
data.value: Saves all urls as a text file for exchange.

data.name: ToolTipDownloadFromDescription
data.value: Must be in YYYYMMDD format. Empty means from the beginning of the blog.

data.name: ToolTipDownloadToDescription
data.value: Must be in YYYYMMDD format. Empty means to now.

data.name: ToolTipPageSizeTumblrSearchDescription
data.value: Sets the post per page. E.g. 50 means to scan 50 posts per page.

data.name: ToolTipPasswordDescription
data.value: Caution: The password is stored in clear text in the blogs database.

data.name: ToolTipTagsDescription
data.value: Must be in a comma separated list without the leading hash (#) sign. E.g. great big car, bears searches for great big cars and bears.

data.name: ToolTipTimeoutDescription
data.value: The length of time, in seconds, until the request times out.

data.name: ToolTipVideoConnections
data.value: Number of concurrent connections to the tumblr video host

data.name: ToolTipVideoConnectionsDescription
data.value: The v*.tumblr.com hosts regularly close connections if the number is too high.

data.name: ToolTipGfycatFiletypeDescription
data.value: Chose which file type you want to download

data.name: ToolTipWebmshareFiletypeDescription
data.value: Chose which file type you want to download

data.name: ToolTipDumpCrawlerData
data.value: Dump the crawler data to disk.

data.name: ToolTipDumpCrawlerDataDescription
data.value: Writes the data gather from the crawler to disk, separated per post.

data.name: ToolTipFileDownloadLocationDescription
data.value: If not empty, all files are downloaded in the specified folder

data.name: LoadAllDatabases
data.value: Check for file existence globally across all loaded blogs

data.name: ToolTipLoadAllDatabases
data.value: During an active crawl each file is checked globally if it already exists instead of blog wise.

data.name: ToolTipLoadAllDatabasesDescription
data.value: When checking a blog, all posts are compared against each other before downloading to prevent the download of duplicate binary files. This is done blog wise. Enabling this options will compare each file globally. Activation will increase the memory usage during operation based on the amount of already downloaded content.

data.name: ToolTipCatBoxFiletypeDescription
data.value: Chose which file type you want to download

data.name: ToolTipUguuFiletypeDescription
data.value: Chose which file type you want to download

data.name: ToolTipTumblrLoginDescription
data.value: The login is not saved locally but only used for generating a cookie.

data.name: ToolTipTumblrPasswordDescription
data.value: The password is not saved locally but only used for generating a cookie.

data.name: ToolTipAuthenticateBrowserDescription
data.value: Opens a browser window to authenticate yourself to the tumblr.com site. The cookies used for authentication are saved and the authentication process needs to be done only once.

data.name: ToolTipLogoutDescription
data.value: Removes the cookies used for authentication from the system.

data.name: CheckStatusOnStartup
data.value: Check blog online status on startup

data.name: ToolTipProgressUpdate
data.value: Refresh rate of the progress information

data.name: ToolTipProgressUpdateDescription
data.value: Refresh rate of the progress information in the queue panel. This value determines the information refresh rate for each individual queued blog.

data.name: ToolTipRegExPhotos
data.value: Search for images in the crawl data

data.name: ToolTipRegExPhotosDescription
data.value: Uses regular expressions to search for images in everything TumblThree scans. This might add plenty of duplicate or random image urls to the queue, but could potentially gather images from websites that are currently not supported by a specifically written parser.

data.name: ToolTipRegExVideos
data.value: Search for videos in the crawl data

data.name: ToolTipRegExVideosDescription
data.value: Uses regular expressions to search for videos in everything TumblThree scans. This might add plenty of duplicate or random video urls to the queue, but could potentially gather videos from websites that are currently not supported by a specifically written parser.

data.name: ToolTipBlogtypeCrawlerDescription
data.value:
For tumblr blogs, you can choose between:
* TumblAPI: Uses Tumblr API v1 (no login required), or * TumblrSVC: A service internally used by tumblr for web site rendering. Can download larger images than 1280px. Requires login.

data.name: ToolTipLimitConnectionsSvc
data.value: Limit connections to the tumblr SVC service.

data.name: ToolTipLimitConnectionsSvcDescription
data.value: A too high value will forcefully close connections (429 -- Limit Exceeded) made to the tumblr SVC service. A too small value will decrease the scanning speed. Set a number/time pair. Note: The tumblr api is only used for regular tumblr blog downloads.

data.name: ToolTipImageSizeDescription
data.value:
Photo size to download in pixels.
best - download largest size possible (SVC, API only newer blogs), or 1280px else.

data.name: VisitBlogOnTumbex
data.value: Open the site in the web browser (on tumbex.com)

data.name: ToolTipOverrideTumblrBlogCrawlerDescription
data.value: Defines the default Tumblr Blog Crawler implementation used for scraping when adding a new Tumblr blog.

data.name: ToolTipLogLevelDescription
data.value: Specify the log level (from Error only to Verbose details) or put it Off.

data.name: ToolTipLimitConnectionsDescription
data.value: A too big value leads to an error (429 - Limit Exceeded) and prevents further connections to the Tumblr API. A too small value reduces the crawl speed. Specify a number/time pair. Note: The Tumblr API is only used for regular Tumblr-Blog downloads.

data.name: ToolTipGroupPhotoSetsDescription
ToolTipFilenameTemplate
data.value: Specify a filename template for saving the downloaded files.

data.name: ToolTipFilenameTemplateDescription
data.value: The following tokens can be used in the filename template: %f original filename (default) %b blog name %d post date (yyyyMMdd) %e post date and time (yyyyMMddHHmmss) %g post date in GMT (yyyyMMdd) %h post date and time in GMT (yyyyMMddHHmmss) %u post timestamp (number) %o blog name of reblog origin %p post title %i post id %n image index (of photo sets, else skipped) %t for all tags (cute+cats,big+dogs) %r for reblog %s slug (last part of a post's url) %k reblog-key Mandatory tokens (if not using token %f) to make filenames unique: %x "_{number}" ({number}: 2..n) appended to filename %y " ({number})" ({number}: 2..n) appended to filename Example (saving an image): %i_%f for {post id}_{tumblr filename}.jpg If additionally the option "group photo sets" is enabled, then for image sets the token %i is replaced by {post id}_{image index} or, if the token isn't used, the images sets are saved as {post id}_{image index}_{filename template}. Put the option off if you want to use your own template for photo sets.

data.name: ToolTipPrivacyConsentBrowserDescription
data.value: Opens a browser window to accept the tumblr.com privacy consent. The cookies for the privacy consent are saved and the process needs to be done only once in a while.

data.name: ToolTipLanguageDescription
data.value: Please choose the desired UI language.

data.name: ToolTipLoadArchive
data.value: Include archived blog databases in the global check for file duplicates.

data.name: ToolTipLoadArchiveDescription
data.value: This option can only be activated if the global check has been activated. If activated, not only all active blogs, but also all blog databases inside the Archive folder are used for duplicate check of a file. Activation will increase the memory usage during operation based on the amount of already archived blogs.

data.name: ArchiveIndex
data.value: Archive the index files instead of deleting

data.name: ToolTipArchiveIndex
data.value: Archive the index files instead of deleting

data.name: ToolTipArchiveIndexDescription
data.value: If this option is activated, the index files are not deleted, but moved to a subfolder Archive inside the Index folder. All index files inside this subfolder can be used for the global check for file duplicates, if activated.

data.name: ToolTipImageSizeCategoryDescription
data.value:
Photo size category to download.
Possible categories: large, medium, small, thumb

data.name: ToolTipVideoSizeCategoryDescription
data.value:
Video size category to download.
Possible categories: large, medium, small

data.name: CollectionsHint
data.value: The download location is only used for newly created blogs under that collection. If the assigned collection of a blog is changed, only the blog's index files are moved to the new collection. The blog's download folder needs to be moved manually, if necessary.

data.name: FeedbackIntroduction
data.value: We highly appreciate your feedback! Tell us what you like or don't like about TumblThree. Please write your message in english. Alternatively you can use the {Issues section} on our project site to get in touch with us.

data.name: Email
data.value: Email (won't be published; for a possible answer)

data.name: ToolTipCollection
data.value: Assign the blog to this collection.

data.name: ToolTipCollectionDescription
data.value: If you change the collection the blog's database files with be copied to the new location, but the blog's download folder with the media remains at the old location. A new folder under the collection's root folder will be created and used for newly downloaded files. You can move the old media files manually, if necessary.

data.name: ToolTipDownloadVideoThumbnailsDescription
data.value: Downloads available video thumbnails. This setting is independent of 'Download images' and 'Download videos'.

data.name: ToolTipPnjDownloadFormat
data.value: Image format for downloading PNJ links

data.name: ToolTipPnjDownloadFormatDescription
data.value: Choose the image format for downloading PNJ links. Tumblr offers some images as the uploaded PNG and as converted to JPG format for space saving. In a browser you are shown the JPG version which normally is visually the same, but takes much less storage space.

data.name: ToolTipOfflineDuplicateCheck
data.value: Cache the blog databases for offline duplicate check

data.name: ToolTipIsArchiveCollectionDescription
data.value: If activated, the collection is marked as an archive. The collection is readonly and no blogs can be assigned to it.

data.name: ToolTipOfflineDuplicateCheckDescription
data.value: If activated, this collection's blog databases are copied to a cache folder inside the default collection's archive folder. The copying is done on shutdown of the application, if the collection is available.

data.name: ToolTipAuthenticateBrowserTwitterDescription
data.value: Opens a browser window to authenticate yourself to the twitter.com site. The cookies used for authentication are saved and the authentication process needs to be done only once.

data.name: ToolTipPrivacyConsentBrowserTwitterDescription
data.value: Opens a browser window to accept the Twitter.com privacy consent. The cookies for the privacy consent are saved and the process needs to be done only once in a while.

data.name: ToolTipDownloadLikesFromDescription
data.value: Must be in YYYYMMDD format. Empty means from the beginning of the likes.

data.name: TumblrAuthErrorAutoRetry
data.value: Use new mode of handling Tumblr authorization errors

data.name: ToolTipTumblrAuthErrorAutoRetry
data.value: Use new mode of handling Tumblr authorization/login errors

data.name: ToolTipTumblrAuthErrorAutoRetryDescription
data.value: When an authorization error occurs, the app tries a new way of handling it in order to continue.

data.name: HideToolBarButtonsText
data.value: Hide toolbar button's text *app restart required

data.name: ToolTipHideToolBarButtonsText
data.value: Hide toolbar button's text from main application window

data.name: ToolTipHideToolBarButtonsTextDescription
data.value: Hides the text on buttons from main application window and leaves tooltips on, so all the toolbar buttons have the same width
